text:
The SiteTreeGenerator currently generates the sitetree from the SiteTree object
everytime the generator is invoked. This patch/enhancement makes the
SiteTreeGenerator cacheable by the cocoon cache.
creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com

text:
Created attachment 14662
Patch for DefaultSitetree and SiteTreeGenerator.

Adds last modified awareness to the DefaultSiteTree and declares the
SiteTreeGenerator as a cacheable component.
creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com

text:
Created attachment 14663
Interface LastModified

Interface for getting the last modification timestamp of an object. Used by the
SiteTreeGenerator, implemented by the DefaultSiteTree.
creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
text:
Created attachment 14664
Patch for DefaultSitetree and SiteTreeGenerator.

Thanks for spotting Josias!

creator: michi@apache.org
text:
thanks for these patches. I have tested and committed them to 1.2.X.

Would it make sense to also apply them to 1.4-dev?

Michi
